scenes.description: Vestia Zeta's MC section, introducing the next performance and special guest.
A poster reveal introducing Ninomae Ina'nis as the guest.
Performance of the song 'Violet' (Jazz version) by Ninomae Ina'nis and Vestia Zeta.
Post-performance MC section with Ina and Zeta.

subtitles.original: Ooh, I hope you guys like this!
subtitles.english: Ooh, I hope you guys like this!

subtitles.original: So yeah...
subtitles.english: So yeah...

subtitles.original: Um, don't go anywhere because there will be the next performance.
subtitles.english: Um, don't go anywhere because there will be the next performance.

subtitles.original: Right, Bozo?
subtitles.english: Right, Bozo?

subtitles.original: Bozo... Bozo can't answer so... (laughs)
subtitles.english: Bozo... Bozo can't answer so... (laughs)

subtitles.original: Jadi masih ada lanjut performance berikutnya.
subtitles.english: So there's still the next performance coming up.

subtitles.original: 次の曲はね...
subtitles.english: As for the next song...

subtitles.original: Do you guys know? Do you guys know?
subtitles.english: Do you guys know? Do you guys know?

subtitles.original: Can you guess? Can you have a little bit of a guess?
subtitles.english: Can you guess? Can you have a little bit of a guess?

subtitles.original: I'll guess... um, okay okay.
subtitles.english: I'll guess... um, okay okay.

subtitles.original: I'll give you guys some clue.
subtitles.english: I'll give you guys some clue.

subtitles.original: Hmm... Hmm...
subtitles.english: Hmm... Hmm...

subtitles.original: Huuh, we have a special guest so...
subtitles.english: Huuh, we have a special guest so...

subtitles.original: Who can it be? 誰だろう？
subtitles.english: Who can it be? I wonder who it is?

subtitles.original: Can you guess who?
subtitles.english: Can you guess who?

subtitles.original:
JAZZ SHOW
SPECIAL PERFORMANCE BY NINOMAE INA'NIS
subtitles.english:
JAZZ SHOW
SPECIAL PERFORMANCE BY NINOMAE INA'NIS

subtitles.original: 花が寝る夜 波に映った星
subtitles.english: The night when flowers sleep, the stars reflected on the waves

subtitles.original: 唸れる月が足をくすぐる
subtitles.english: The groaning moon tickles my feet

subtitles.original: 流れる光に沿って行ってみたら
subtitles.english: When I try to follow the flowing light

subtitles.original: 耳に囁いた 君に届かない？
subtitles.english: Does what I whispered in your ear not reach you?

subtitles.original: 今手を繋いでも
subtitles.english: Even if we hold hands now

subtitles.original: 精一杯抱きしめても
subtitles.english: Even if I hug you as hard as I can

subtitles.original: 空は秋に満ちるんだ
subtitles.english: The sky is filled with autumn

subtitles.original: 指先でゆらゆらと
subtitles.english: Swaying at my fingertips

subtitles.original: その動きが止まった時計の針に飛び込んだ
subtitles.english: That movement jumped into the hands of the clock that stopped

subtitles.original: 固まった願いさえ
subtitles.english: Even the frozen wishes

subtitles.original: 離れたい今は その笑顔
subtitles.english: I want to get away from that smile right now

subtitles.original: 知ってるよ
subtitles.english: I know

subtitles.original: 知ってるよ
subtitles.english: I know

subtitles.original: 光歌う夜 目に映った空
subtitles.english: The night when light sings, the sky reflected in my eyes

subtitles.original: 爽やかな香りがくすぐる
subtitles.english: A refreshing scent tickles me

subtitles.original: 足跡合わせて歩いてみたら
subtitles.english: When I try to walk matching our footprints

subtitles.original: 私を見ていた 君に届かない？
subtitles.english: Does it not reach you, who was looking at me?

subtitles.original: ずっと手を繋いでも
subtitles.english: Even if we hold hands forever

subtitles.original: 君について行ってみても 空は雨に染めるんだ
subtitles.english: Even if I try to follow you, the sky turns to rain

subtitles.original: 君を呼び出した声
subtitles.english: The voice that called out to you

subtitles.original: の形が 渇いた色濡らして
subtitles.english: Its shape wets the parched colors

subtitles.original: 強く叫んだ声が
subtitles.english: The voice that screamed out loudly

subtitles.original: 散らばった今は その言葉を
subtitles.english: Has scattered now, those words

subtitles.original: 知ってるよ
subtitles.english: I know

subtitles.original: 知ってるよ
subtitles.english: I know

subtitles.original: 君は分かってるかな 教えてくれた
subtitles.english: I wonder if you understand? You told me

subtitles.original: 戻らない その幸せは
subtitles.english: That happiness which won't return

subtitles.original: I'm so... I'm so excited to sing this with you.
subtitles.english: I'm so... I'm so excited to sing this with you.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much, Ina, for singing with me.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much, Ina, for singing with me.

subtitles.original: "Violet" has been one of my favorite songs, so I'm really happy...
subtitles.english: "Violet" has been one of my favorite songs, so I'm really happy...

subtitles.original: ...that I got to sing this, especially with you and in jazzy version as well!
subtitles.english: ...that I got to sing this, especially with you and in jazzy version as well!

subtitles.original: I love Jazz, and I love you.
subtitles.english: I love Jazz, and I love you.

subtitles.original: Thank you, Ina.
subtitles.english: Thank you, Ina.

subtitles.original: No, thank you for inviting me to sing with you, especially "Violet" too!
subtitles.english: No, thank you for inviting me to sing with you, especially "Violet" too!

subtitles.original: Inoseta- also I really love your singing voice, so it made me really happy...
subtitles.english: Inoseta- also I really love your singing voice, so it made me really happy...

subtitles.original: ...that you wanted to sing "Violet" with me.
subtitles.english: ...that you wanted to sing "Violet" with me.

subtitles.original: Thank you again, love you too Zeta!
subtitles.english: Thank you again, love you too Zeta!
